import React, { Component } from 'react' import { ticket } from './TicketFunctions' class Ticket extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: '', content: '', messages:'', status:'', img:'', userid: '', errors: {} } this.onChange = this.onChange.bind(this) this.onSubmit = this.onSubmit.bind(this) } onChange(e) { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() const newTicket = { name: this.state.name, content: this.state.content, messages: this.state.messages, status: this.state.status, img: this.state.img, userid: this.state.userid } ticket(newTicket).then(res => { this.props.history.push(`/tickets`) }) } render() { return (

ADD TICKET

) } } export default Ticket
